comment: wrt Russia: The US has violated - or abandoned - at least half a dozen weapons treaties with Russia, including the ABM treaty. The US developed new ABM's, then freaked out when Russia one-upped them, and created a better delivery system, and - arguably - better ABM's. Now, Russia is eviiiil in the eyes of neo-cons and zionists.
